page.title: 15A TYPICAL WORKING DAY
page.content:
A typical day at home begins with dad waking us up at 7:30am. My sister and I get ready for school. At 8:00am my sister goes to school, at 8:30am I go to school. My mum and dad are at home until 12:30pm, when my sister comes home for lunch. At 12:30pm my dad goes to work and my mum takes the dog for a walk and does the house work. At 3:35pm my sister comes home from school, at 3:40pm Icome home and watch T.V. At 5:30pm my dad comes home. We have dinner at 6:00pm and at 10:00 I go to bed.
By Rozelle Dowse. Aged 11
